instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 wathr damage - GREEN/ORANGE no fan, bypass smc just fan full speed.
threads.message:
ppbus_g3h 8.4v
pp5v5_s5 5v
pp3v3_s5 3v
pp3v42_g3h 3.3v

u1950(replaced twice)
1,8 - 3.3v
all the rest 0v
pp5v_s0 5v

smc_reset_l 3.3v with trigger down to 0v then back to 3.3v
pm_btlow_l 3.3v 
pm_pwrbtn_l 3.4vwith trigger down to 0v then back to 3.3v

pm_slp_s5_l 3.3v
pm_slp+s4_l 3.3v
 cpu getting hot(not to hot)

threads.title: 820-00165 wathr damage - GREEN/ORANGE no fan, bypass smc just fan full speed.
threads.message:
If you get PM_SLP_S4_L, there should be S3 voltages present; like L7430, L7820.
Did you check PM_SLP_S3_L too?
If present, only then you can expect S0 voltages; check L7630 and page 58.

threads.title: 820-00165 wathr damage - GREEN/ORANGE no fan, bypass smc just fan full speed.
threads.message:
L7430 1.2V
L7820 1.7V
PM_SLP_S3_L 3.3V

L7630 1.1V
PAGE 58:
PP1V5_S0 0.5V
ALL THE REST LOOK FINE

threads.title: 820-00165 wathr damage - GREEN/ORANGE no fan, bypass smc just fan full speed.
threads.message:
It comes from U7870; post all its voltages.
Check diode mode to ground at 1V5_S0.

threads.title: 820-00165 wathr damage - GREEN/ORANGE no fan, bypass smc just fan full speed.

820-00165 wathr damage - GREEN/ORANGE no fan, bypass smc just fan full speed.
threads.message:
Diode mode to ground at R8041?
You can check what happens removing U8040.
I recommend to try first disconnecting LIO flex.

threads.title: 820-00165 wathr damage - GREEN/ORANGE no fan, bypass smc just fan full speed.
threads.message:
was corrosion on J9500.
R8041 short on  PP1V5_S0SW_AUDIO_HDA. NOT FROM C1210 OR FROM Q1920. I THINK FROM CPU.
witout R8041 fan spin, with is not..

threads.title: 820-00165 wathr damage - GREEN/ORANGE no fan, bypass smc just fan full speed.
threads.message: turn no but of course no audio :(

threads.title: 820-00165 wathr damage - GREEN/ORANGE no fan, bypass smc just fan full speed.
threads.message: Post exact ohm resistance to ground at PP1V5_S0SW_AUDIO_HDA.

threads.title: 820-00165 wathr damage - GREEN/ORANGE no fan, bypass smc just fan full speed.
820-00165 wathr damage - GREEN/ORANGE no fan, bypass smc just fan full speed.
threads.message:
You can try to inject 1-2V (no more) there.
It will probably heat the PCH, without solving the problem; just for confirmation.

Look en Internet for portable USB speaker.
You should find some model specially designed for laptop, to attach on top of the screen.
